document_data.name: Thesis on Conditional Ruptures
document_data.author: [[Archveult Tattercloak]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thesis on Conditional Ruptures''''' was a book by the [[wizard]] [[Archveult Tattercloak]].The ''Dragon'' article contains a disclaimer that not all the books it lists are necessarily written by a given spell inventor, and could instead be written by an apprentice or relative.
document_data.Description: The book detailed several [[spell]]s, including ''[[teleport]]'', ''[[phase door]]'', ''[[shadow door]]'', ''[[maze]]'', and ''[[Archveult's skybolt]]''.
